description: Elliot is an athletic guy who’s been playing soccer since he was 4 years old, so naturally he has a nice body. His position – striker! I have to admit that I don’t know much about soccer, so he explained. “It's the one who scores all the goals.” He snickered. Somehow, I’m not sure soccer is the only thing he meant. Elliot wanted to do something a bit different, so we went to a sex shop to buy a butt plug. He’s never played with his hole before, so we asked him what he thought it would feel like. “I think it’s gonna be a great sensation, I’m probably gonna cum even faster than usual.” It turns out he was right and blew a huge load on the bed!
title: Elliot
